alert.note: Alert for Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 9:23AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Monterey County through 1000 AM PST... At 923 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Colman Canyon, or 9 miles east of Lucia, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... King City, San Lucas and Colman Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
